headline: Nuclear Energy Stocks Enter 2025 On A High. AI Data Centers Need Them, A Lot.
summary: Nuclear stocks ran hot on the S&P 500 in 2024 as AI data center operators locked down a future's worth of energy. And 2025 is off to a strong start.

headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Investigates Claims On Behalf of Investors of Oklo Inc. - OKLO
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 2, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP is investigating claims on behalf of investors of Oklo Inc.  .  Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton at newaction@pomlaw.com or...
